message.pattern: <@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Management Console .+, enabled syslog.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Management Console .+, started packet capture.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Management Console .+, stopped packet capture.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Management Console .+, \w+ed ICAP service .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Administrator login from \S+, user .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Read/write mode entered from \S+ for user .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Management Console .+, changed config:Access_log:.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Management Console .+, installed new VPM \S+ File.+"):msg@>

<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Access Log.+: Unable to connect to remote server for log uploading.+"):msg@>

<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Snapshot \S+ has fetched .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Access Log Custom.+: Connecting to primary server .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+NTP: Periodic query of server.+"):msg@>

<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Management Console .+, added service-group entry .+ to service-group.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Management Console .+, set service .+ to .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Health check: Entry .+ health has changed. Functioning properly..+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Health check: Entry .+ health has changed. Health check failed..+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+ISTag for .+ changed from .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Initiating download of .+ database.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Download of .+ database complete.+"):msg@>

<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Download of .+ database failed.+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> ProxySG: <@REGEXP(".+Access Log.+: Closing TCP/IP connection.+"):msg@>
